mapper.sql: menu_id AS menuId, parent_id AS parentId, name, title, component, url, perms, type, icon, order_num AS orderNum
mapper.select: select menu.menu_id, parent_id, name, title, component, url, perms, type, icon, order_num from sys_menu menu, sys_role_menu roleMenu where menu.menu_id=roleMenu.menu_id and roleMenu.role_id=#{roleId}
